attributes.action: Make gp s see patients face to face
attributes.additional_details: Every person is suck of this situation. Ambulances and hospitals are overrun with people who could have been seen by a gp if they were working like everyone else
attributes.background: Stop making patients wait weeks for a telephone appointment

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

There are no Government restrictions that prevent GPs from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
